thread.section_title: The Goring - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Five Star Luxury
thread.title_full: Five Star Luxury - Review of The Goring, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: suewilty
title: Five Star Luxury
text:
Stayed here for a weekend break and we absolutely loved it. Superb location, amazing facilities and first class staff.
We had a beautiful room overlooking the garden (yes garden in central London!) with a small terrace, sadly the weather just not quite warm enough to enjoy it though we did sit out on the bar terrace as it had heaters! We will be back and I'd highly recommend.
